actions.command: /execute as @e[type=wolf,distance=..18] unless data entity @s Owner run data modify entity @s AngerTime set value 4
/execute as @e[type=wolf,distance=..18] unless data entity @s Owner run data modify entity @s AngryAt set from entity @p[tag=foxie] UUID
/execute as @e[type=polar_bear,distance=..16] unless data entity @s Owner run data modify entity @s AngerTime set value 4
/execute as @e[type=polar_bear,distance=..16] unless data entity @s Owner run data modify entity @s AngryAt set from entity @p[tag=foxie] UUID

if_action.command: /execute as @e[type=minecraft:fox,distance=3..15,tag=!sleepin,tag=!hatting] run data modify entity @s Trusted append from entity @p[tag=foxie] UUID

actions.command: /execute as @e[type=fox,nbt={NoAI:1b,NoGravity:1b},tag=sleepin] at @s run execute unless entity @p[distance=..1] run kill @s
